A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is something wrong with this new trilogy so far.  TFA and TLJ seem to have no continuity and unrelated.  I felt the new characters are uninteresting and kinda boring (maybe Kylo has some interesting development)\, I just don't care if anyone dies nor do I care about their futures.  I thought the story/plot was terrible with maybe two highlights and two hundred low points.  \nI hope the last will tie all 9 movies together as advertised.
